name: Shark Dinner
description:
Deep below the sea lurks a very hungry shark. Good thing the sea is full of swimmers who are passing by.

Grab any chance you get to have a bite of those swimmers and stop the shark from starving, have a beach buffet!

But watch out for the bombs, those can really ruin your dinner!

Play as a jaws like shark and grab a bite of those swimmers! Watch your hunger meter!

Feed, eat, bite , snack off those swimmers in this action arcade game!

Don't let the shark starve to death or die by those bombs!

Instructions:
*Use your left mouse button to grab a bite
*Don't eat bombs
*Dont starve to death

This Game is originally a game for Android Devices and also available on iOS in the near future.
App link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ragemonstergames.sharkdinnergame

Any feedback, suggestions or donations are welcome! 
We would like your support!

Thanks for playing and Enjoy
